messages.text:
LGTM

On Jan 4, 2012 7:02 PM, <alex.brainman@gmail.com> wrote:
>
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> make.bash: remove old dregs
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5522043/
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/make.bash
>
>
> Index: src/make.bash
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/make.bash
> +++ b/src/make.bash
> @@ -47,9 +47,6 @@
>  ) >"$GOBIN"/gomake
>  chmod +x "$GOBIN"/gomake
>
> -# TODO(brainman): delete this after 01/01/2012.
> -rm -f "$GOBIN"/gotest  # remove old bash version of gotest on Windows
> -
>  # on Fedora 16 the selinux filesystem is mounted at /sys/fs/selinux,
>  # so loop through the possible selinux mount points
>  for se_mount in /selinux /sys/fs/selinux
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8e3c3ee24f77 ***

make.bash: remove old dregs

R=golang-dev, iant
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5522043

subject: code review 5522043: make.bash: remove old dregs
